conclusion: Plan to analyze the graph to determine the particle's motion and identify moments when speed is 5 m/s.
Graph shows displacement x as a function of time t, with a downward-sloping curve from x = 10 m at t = 0 s to x = 0 m at t = 4 s. A tangent line is drawn at t = 2 s.
Graph illustrates particle's displacement over time, starting at x = 10 m and ending at x = 0 m over 4 s.
Slope of the curve at any point represents the speed of the particle at that time.
To find when speed is 5 m/s, look for tangent line with slope of 5 m/s.
Tangent line at t = 2 s indicates particle's speed is 5 m/s.
Graph does not show multiple instances of speed being 5 m/s, so there is only one moment when speed is 5 m/s.
Final answer is 1 moment when speed is 5 m/s.
